original: Pathology is the study of the causes and effects of diseases, focusing on the structural and functional changes in tissues and organs that result from illness. With advancements in the understanding of causative agents, physicians began to compare the symptoms associated with different pathogens as they manifested in affected individuals. This comparative approach contributed to the foundational understanding that diseases can replicate
